USERNAME_PAGE.OWN_ANDROID_DEVICE: WAIT! Do you own an android device? You can also purchase ranks through our all. Click here
USERNAME_PAGE.FORM_PLACE_HOLDER_PROMOTIONAL_CODE: If you received a promotional code, you can type it in here
USERNAME_PAGE.BUTTON_CONFIRM_DESCRIPTION: Make sure that looks like you! (Should change to your skin)
USERNAME_PAGE.WHY_VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: The confirmation of your username is necessary to prevent fraud and ensure that purchases will be credited to your account.

SHOP_HOMEPAGE.INTRODUCTION_SUB: Begin by clicking your desired packages in the top menu!
SHOP_HOMEPAGE.INTRODUCTION_SUB_2: You can pay with either your PayPal account, or without one. To pay with your account you log in then click Buy Now. To pay without an account you click 'Pay with a debut or credit card, or PayPal Credit'
SHOP_HOMEPAGE.SUPPORT_INFORMATION: Need help? Visit our discord by clicking on the button below or via twitter @VastlandsMC !
SHOP_HOMEPAGE.IMPORTANT_INFORMATION: Purchasing ranks helps support Vastlands, and please allow up-to 1 min to get the perk. Also please note that chargebacks are not allowed, all purchases are final!

RANK_PAGE.INTRODUCTION_SUB: Buying ranks helps support us, to add new features and to improve VastLands!
RANK_PAGE.INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION: Ranks are global and will work in all current and future servers!
RANK_PAGE.INFORMATION_KEY_FEATURE_1: Each ranks comes with a perk, the highest has more.
RANK_PAGE.INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION_LAST: For help and support visit our discord

CAPE_PAGE.INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION: They're capes! They appear behind your back. Show off your style and shine bright!

COINS_PAGE.INTRODUCTION_HEADER: How much would you like to purchase?
COINS_PAGE.INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION: They are a type of money currency Vastlands uses. With it you can purchase things on the in-game shop!
COINS_PAGE.INFORMATION_BOXED: Having a rank will double the amount of coins you buy.
COINS_PAGE.INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION_LAST: For help and support visit our discord
COINS_PAGE.DEALS_INTRODUCTION_SUB: Here's some LIMITED time deals, Purchase while last!
